task.title: Specify report granularity
task.shortdesc: Steps that describe how to view report totals on an hourly, daily, weekly, monthly, quarterly, or yearly basis.

context.p: The report's time period determines which granularity options are available. For example, you can select only Hourly if you have a one or two day time frame selected. You can select only Yearly granularity if you have more than one year selected.

step.cmd: Generate a trended report, such as Site Content > Pages.
Click the View by link, then click a granularity.
